recently_narrative: The most significant operational pattern observed is the increasing reliance on AI and automation within the Zendesk ecosystem, as evidenced by the numerous announcements of new AI-powered features and capabilities. This suggests that Zendesk administrators need to prioritize understanding and effectively managing these AI-driven systems, as they will likely become critical components of the Zendesk platform and require careful monitoring and optimization to ensure stable and reliable customer support operations.

release_notes.summary: Copilot released custom fields in entities. Copilot also released ticket summaries in reporting, views, as placeholders, and via the API.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-10-03
